boardgame.name: Dungeon Twister 2: Prison
boardgame.description: Dungeon Twister 2: Prison will re-launch the Dungeon Twister franchise with second edition rules. Asmodée Editions (ASM DTP01) Fight, get out or die Dungeon Twister is a strategy game for two players. You control a team of eight adventurers with varied and necessary abilities. Your objective: to escape from the Dungeon. Unfortunately, in front of you lies a vast labyrinth of dangerous rooms which can rotate thanks to the astonishing mechanisms constructed by dwarves. These deadly traps and twistings to prevent you from escaping would be enough of a challenge by themselves, but you also face another group of adventurers with the same goal as yourself. Without relying on dice, Dungeon Twister calls upon all of your tactics and strategies, your ability to bluff, your anticipation of the danger and your management of combat and action cards.
New, game in original shrink wrap.

Asmodée Editions (ASM DTP01) Fight, get out or die Dungeon Twister is a strategy game for two players. You control a team of eight adventurers with varied and necessary abilities. Your objective: to escape from the Dungeon. Unfortunately, in front of you lies a vast labyrinth of dangerous rooms which can rotate thanks to the astonishing mechanisms constructed by dwarves. These deadly traps and twistings to prevent you from escaping would be enough of a challenge by themselves, but you also face another group of adventurers with the same goal as yourself. Without relying on dice, Dungeon Twister calls upon all of your tactics and strategies, your ability to bluff, your anticipation of the danger and your management of combat and action cards.
Only played twice. Shipping should be £4.41 for UK standard parcel, will confirm on request.

Asmodee - Dungeon Twister II: Prison Language: English Players: 1-2 Age: 12+ Duration: 15 to 60 min Weight: 1.330 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Fight, get out or die. Dungeon Twister is a strategy game for two players. You control a team of eight adventurers with varied and necessary abilities. Your objective: to escape from the Dungeon. Unfortunately, in front of you lies a vast labyrinth of dangerous rooms which can rotate thanks to the astonishing mechanisms constructed by dwarves. These deadly traps and twistings to prevent you from escaping would be enough of a challenge by themselves, but you also face another group of adventurers with the same goal as yourself. Without relying on dice, Dungeon Twister calls upon all of your tactics and strategies, your ability to bluff, your anticipation of the danger and your management of combat and action cards. Dungeon Twister 2: Prison will re-launch the Dungeon Twister franchise with second edition rules, It will contain 16 miniatures, new rooms, new characters, a tutorial in 5 scenarios, a larger box and best of all, rules for Solitaire play! Solitaire play features six levels of difficulty to provide a challenge to even the most experienced of players. The Second Edition rules include a 5-step scenario-based tutorial. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Asmodee - Dungeon Twister II: Prison Language: English Players: 1-2 Age: 12+ Duration: 15 to 60 min Weight: 1.330 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Fight, get out or die. Dungeon Twister is a strategy game for two players. You control a team of eight adventurers with varied and necessary abilities. Your objective: to escape from the Dungeon. Unfortunately, in front of you lies a vast labyrinth of dangerous rooms which can rotate thanks to the astonishing mechanisms constructed by dwarves. These deadly traps and twistings to prevent you from escaping would be enough of a challenge by themselves, but you also face another group of adventurers with the same goal as yourself. Without relying on dice, Dungeon Twister calls upon all of your tactics and strategies, your ability to bluff, your anticipation of the danger and your management of combat and action cards. Dungeon Twister 2: Prison will re-launch the Dungeon Twister franchise with second edition rules, It will contain 16 miniatures, new rooms, new characters, a tutorial in 5 scenarios, a larger box and best of all, rules for Solitaire play! Solitaire play features six levels of difficulty to provide a challenge to even the most experienced of players. The Second Edition rules include a 5-step scenario-based tutorial. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Asmodee (ASM DTP01) An evil mage has created a dungeon whose rooms and hallways turn to create an ever changing labyrinth. Two groups of adventurers are trapped inside and must fight their way to get out. Will it be yours? Dungeon Twister 2: Prison contains re-written rules, new plastic playing pieces and a step learning process to get players into the game. It is a stand alone game, but can use other Dungeon Twister products.
Payment via PayPal to lucia-lance@att.net
En français

Description: Fight, get out or die Dungeon Twister is a strategy game for two players. You control a team of eight adventurers with varied and necessary abilities. Your objective: to escape from the Dungeon. Unfortunately, in front of you lies a vast labyrinth of dangerous rooms which can rotate thanks to the astonishing mechanisms constructed by dwarves. These deadly traps and twistings to prevent you from escaping would be enough of a challenge by themselves, but you also face another group of adventurers with the same goal as yourself. Without relying on dice, Dungeon Twister calls upon all of your tactics and strategies, your ability to bluff, your anticipation of the danger and your management of combat and action cards. Components: 8 square rooms 2 starting zones 2 screens (game aides) 2 sets of tokens (8 characters and 6 objects for each player) 2 sets of 8 figurines and 16 plastic stands 2 sets of playing cards (16 cards per player), including 9 Combat cards, - 3 jump cards and 4 action cards. Several open/broken herse markers Several markers to keep track of the actions carried out One rule book ********************************* Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Alle Spiele stammen aus einem tierfreien Nichtraucherhaushalt. All games are from a smoke and pet free home. Zahlung: Bezahlung per Überweisung oder bei Abholung im Raum Saarbrücken. Die Versandkosten betragen 5,99 Euro Beim Kauf mehrere Artikel vom Marketplace wird der günstigste Versand für die gekauften Artikel ermittelt. Der Versand erfolgt immer versichert und mit Sendungsverfolgung. Bei Unklarheiten oder Fragen bitte vor dem Kauf mit mir Kontakt aufnehmen. Es handelt sich um einen Privatverkauf. Der Verkaufsgegenstand wird unter Ausschluss jeglicher Gewährleistung verkauft. Der Ausschluss gilt nicht für Schadensersatzansprüche aus grob fahrlässiger bzw. vorsätzlicher Verletzung von Pflichten des Verkäufers sowie für jede Verletzung von Leben, Körper und Gesundheit. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Pick up the game(s) at my home. (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. If something is not clear or if you have any questions please contact me befor you buy a game. Thanks for looking, keep gaming.
